Keys: (Or, hold 'Enter' to start - Hold 'Esc' to skip)
English: (Or, hold 'Enter' to start - Hold 'Esc' to skip)

Keys: 1. Never launch OVR Toolkit through Oculus Home -This may launch the application incorrectly. 2. Please refer to the 'Oculus' page on our Wiki (by the button above) if OVR Toolkit doesn't appear in your games due to the game not running through OpenVR. 3. Please note that running games through OpenVR may reduce their performance as you will be rendering SteamVR and the Oculus compositor. This is unavoidable with any overlay application on Steam! Don't hesitate to join our Discord for help! :)
English:
1. Never launch OVR Toolkit through Oculus Home -This may launch the application incorrectly.

2. Please refer to the 'Oculus' page on our Wiki (by the button above) if OVR Toolkit doesn't appear in your games due to the game not running through OpenVR.

3. Please note that running games through OpenVR may reduce their performance as you will be rendering SteamVR and the Oculus compositor. This is unavoidable with any overlay application on Steam!

Don't hesitate to join our Discord for help! :)

Keys: An event you're interested in is starting in under 1 hour!
English: An event you're interested in is starting in under 1 hour!

Keys: An event you're interested in is starting in under 30 minutes!
English: An event you're interested in is starting in under 30 minutes!

Keys: An event you're interested in is starting! Open Edit Mode for join instructions.
English: An event you're interested in is starting! Open Edit Mode for join instructions.

Keys: Angle snapping, face headset, automatic curving
English: Angle snapping, face headset, automatic curving

Keys: Background image, keyboard language, Steam Workshop, accent colours
English: Background image, accent colours, notifications, night light

Keys: Best effort can only be used with desktop captures!
English: Max framerate can only be used with desktop captures!

Keys: Best effort cannot be used on monitors not connected to your main GPU!
English: Max framerate cannot be used on monitors not connected to your main GPU!

Keys: Cancel alarm through the Wristwatch clock tab.
English: Wakey wakey! Cancel alarm through the Wristwatch clock tab.

Keys: Cancel timer through the Wristwatch clock tab.
English: Time's up! Cancel timer through the Wristwatch clock tab.

Keys: Changing the hiding angle is only possible when the overlay is attached to a device.
English: Changing the hiding angle is only possible when the overlay is attached to a device.

Keys: Click 'Set Contents' to change what a window is displaying.
English: Click 'Set Contents' to change what a window is displaying.

Keys: Click 'Spawn Window' to create a new window.
English: Click 'Spawn Window' to create a new window.

Keys: Click or press 'R' to search again.
English: Click 'Search' or press 'R' to search again.

Keys: Click the gear icon to open Edit Mode
English: Click the gear icon to open 'Edit Mode'

Keys: Close 'Edit Mode' again by clicking the gear icon.
English: Close 'Edit Mode' again by clicking the gear icon.

Keys: Close 'Edit Mode' again by pressing F8.
English: Close 'Edit Mode' again by pressing F8.

Keys: Close the dashboard to use OVR Toolkit
English: Close the dashboard to use OVR Toolkit

Keys: Closing 'Edit Mode' will only close the menu. To toggle your created windows on and off without entering or exiting Edit Mode, press F7.
English:
Closing 'Edit Mode' will only close the menu.
To toggle your created windows on and off without entering or exiting Edit Mode, press F7.

Keys: Closing 'Edit Mode' will toggle off your windows, however, you can keep them visible by enabling the 'Keep Visible' option in 'Window Settings'.
English: Closing 'Edit Mode' will toggle off your windows, however, you can keep them visible by enabling the 'Keep Visible' option in 'Window Settings'.

Keys: Compact UI, legacy Edit Mode, resize menu
English: Compact UI, legacy Edit Mode, resize menu

Keys: Connection lost, please restart OVR Toolkit!
English: Connection lost, please restart OVR Toolkit!

Keys: Curved overlays are only available when a window isn't attached to a controller
English: Curved overlays are only available when a window isn't attached to a controller

Keys: Description too long, please limit to 3000 characters.
English: Description too long, please limit to 3000 characters.

Keys: Do you want to start this application?
English: Do you want to start this application?

Keys: Don't use Steam or Discord? Send me an e-mail at: curtis@ovrtoolkit.co.uk
English: Don't use Steam or Discord? Send me an e-mail at: curtis@ovrtoolkit.co.uk

Keys: Drop a window on the attach point on a hand to attach a window to your hand.
English: Drop a window on the attach point on a hand to attach a window to your hand.

Keys: Drop a window on the detach point to detatch the window from your hand.
English: Drop a window on the detach point to detatch the window from your hand.

Keys: Eco Mode is still enabled. Disable it in 'Window Settings' to keep higher frame rate.
English: Eco Mode is still enabled. Disable it in 'Window Settings' to keep higher frame rate.

Keys: Edit Mode allows you to create new windows, move them, and select what they display.
English: Edit Mode allows you to create new windows, move them, and select what they display.

Keys: Enable, switch hands, change modules, resize overlay
English: Enable, switch hands, change modules, resize overlay

Keys: Enter the 'Window List' menu and select 'Spawn Window'.
English: Enter the 'Window List' menu and select 'Spawn Window'.

Keys: Enter the 'Window Settings' menu and select 'Move Window'.
English: Enter the 'Window Settings' menu and select 'Move Window'.

Keys: Enter the 'Window Settings' menu and select 'Set Contents' to change what a window displays.
English: Enter the 'Window Settings' menu and select 'Set Contents' to change what a window displays.

Keys: Events doesn't support this game yet, sorry!
English: Events doesn't support this game yet, sorry!

Keys: Hide when not looking at window
Hide wrist overlay when not visible
English: Hide wrist overlay when not visible

Keys: Hold 'A' near a window to move it. (Optionally use 'Grip')
English:
Hold 'A' near a window to move it.
(Optionally use 'Grip')

Keys: Hold 'Grip' near a window to move it.
English: Hold 'Grip' near a window to move it.

Keys: Holding 'Shift' will move windows faster. Holding 'Alt' will move windows slower.
English:
Holding 'Shift' will move windows faster.
Holding 'Alt' will move windows slower.

Keys: How to use: Use the 'Spawn Mask' button to create objects that will hide parts of the window. Move masks around by holding the Trigger on them and dragging. Masks will show as white whilst in the cropping menu, but will be see-through once you close the menu.
English:
How to use:

Use the 'Spawn Mask' button to create objects that will hide parts of the window.

Move masks around by holding the Trigger on them and dragging.

Masks will show as white whilst in the cropping menu, but will be see-through once you close the menu.

English: Invalid Join Link! Maybe the event host didn't set one?

English: Invalid event description, must not be empty!

English: Invalid event join instructions, must not be empty!

English: Invalid event name, must not be empty!

English: Invalid event time, must be within 14 days!

English: More will add to this menu as you use different media applications.

English: Name too long, please limit to 60 characters.

English: Navigate the menu by using the arrow keys, Enter, and Backspace.

Keys: Need help? Position the window so that the center of it is close to the attach point. The circle around the attach point will shrink as you move the window closer.
English: Need help? Position the window so that the center of it is close to the attach point. The circle around the attach point will shrink as you move the window closer.

English: Night light will enable with the Windows night light

English: OVR Toolkit is starting, please wait!

English: Only block input in Edit Mode

English: Please do not hesitate to join us on Discord to provide feedback or suggestions to improve the experience!

English: Please join us on Discord for the fastest response, or, post on the Steam Discussions!

English:
Please put your headset on
to start using OVR Toolkit!

Keys: Press Delete to delete a window, Insert to bring the window into view.
English: Press 'Delete' to delete a window, 'Insert' to bring the window into view, 'Enter'/'Return' to select a window.

Keys: Re-center window will position windows relative to your headset each time you toggle your overlays, useful when using 'playspace mover' applications.
English: Re-center window will position windows relative to your headset each time you toggle your overlays, useful when using 'playspace mover' applications.

Keys: Select a window by clicking on it to use Window Settings!
English: Select a window by clicking on it to use Window Settings!

English: Select your preffered wrist watch size

Keys: Selected file is not a PNG file!
English: Selected file is not a PNG file!

Keys: Setup hotkeys for faster window switching!
Show and hide your windows by double pressing both 'A' buttons.
English: Show and hide your windows by double pressing both 'A' buttons.

Keys: Show and hide your windows by double pressing both 'Grip' buttons.
English: Show and hide your windows by double pressing both 'Grip' buttons.

English: Sounds, word suggestions, rotation lock, microphone

English: Spawn another window from the 'Window List' menu.

English: Start a game to see Events!

English: Startup complete! You can now use OVR Toolkit!

English: Thank you for choosing OVR Toolkit!

English: The currently selected window is shown by a yellow border around it.

English: There are upcoming events for this game!

Keys: These will appear on your wristwatch in VR
English: These will appear on your wristwatch in VR

Keys: This fix will link your SteamVR Resolution to your overlay supersampling. (Up to 150 )
This will set the default settings used on all newly spawned windows, are you sure?
English: This will set the default settings used on all newly spawned windows, are you sure?

Keys: This workaround will trick SteamVR into thinking your PC is faster than it is so the overlay resolution will be increased.
English: This workaround will trick SteamVR into thinking your PC is faster than it is so the overlay resolution will be increased.

Keys: Those are the basics of using OVR Toolkit! Find more info on our wiki or on our Discord!
English: Those are the basics of using OVR Toolkit! Find more info on our wiki or on our Discord!

Keys: To configure, recenter your view in game then open Edit Mode
English:
Re-center your view until the windows are in the correct position.


Press 'R' to reload window positions.

Press Enter to finish calibration. (Or toggle Edit Mode with VR controllers)

Keys: To move windows, hold the grip button near them whilst in 'Edit Mode'.
English: To move windows, hold the grip button near them whilst in 'Edit Mode'.

Keys: To resize a window, hold both 'A' buttons and move your hands apart or together.
English: To resize a window, hold both 'A' buttons and move your hands apart or together.

Keys: To resize a window, hold both 'Grip' buttons and move your hands apart or together.
English: To resize a window, hold both 'Grip' buttons and move your hands apart or together.

Keys: To select which window you are editing open 'Window List', navigate to the window you would like to edit, then press 'Enter'.
English: To select which window you are editing open 'Window List', navigate to the window you would like to edit, then press 'Enter'.

Keys: To toggle 'Edit Mode' double press both grip buttons at the same time.
English: To toggle 'Edit Mode' double press both grip buttons at the same time.

Keys: Touchscreen input, touchpad scrolling, grip resizing
English: Touchscreen input, touchpad scrolling, grip resizing

Keys: Use arrow keys to navigate the menu. Enter to select, Backspace to go back.
English: Use arrow keys to navigate the menu. Enter to select, Backspace to go back.

Keys: Use right arrow key to access favourite windows.
English: Use right arrow key to access favourite windows.

Keys: Use the on-screen movement controls to manipulate the window's position.
English: Use the on-screen movement controls to manipulate the window's position.

Keys: Voice recognition can be stopped and started by the voice input bar on top of the keyboard. For VRChat Chatbox output, ensure you click the 'VRC' button!
English: Voice recognition can be stopped and started by the voice input bar on top of the keyboard. For VRChat Chatbox output, ensure you click the 'VRC' button!

Keys: Whilst holding a window, push up or down on the Joystick to push the window forwards or backwards.
English: Whilst holding a window, push up or down on the Joystick to push the window forwards or backwards.

Keys: Whilst holding a window, push up or down on the Trackpad to push the window forwards or backwards.
English: Whilst holding a window, push up or down on the Trackpad to push the window forwards or backwards.

Keys: Window moving when not in Edit Mode
English: Window moving when not in Edit Mode

Keys: Would you like to take a short tutorial on how it works?
English: Would you like to take a short tutorial on how it works?

Keys: You can keep windows visible by clicking the 'Pin' icon below them when in 'Edit Mode'.
English: You can keep windows visible by clicking the 'Pin' icon below them when in 'Edit Mode'.

Keys: Your SteamVR Resolution will be linked to your overlay resolution. (Up to 150 )
English: Your SteamVR Resolution will be linked to your overlay resolution. (Up to 150%)

English: Your event starts in 5 minutes, please ensure your Join Instructions are set!
